title: Arena Kombëtare
summary: Arena Kombëtare (pronounced [aɾɛna komˈbətaɾɛ]) is an all-seater, multi-purpose football stadium located in the capital city of Tirana which was built on the ground of the former Qemal Stafa Stadium.[2] Officially known as the Air Albania Stadium for sponsorship reasons, the stadium has a seating capacity of 22,500 constituting the largest stadium in Albania.[3][4]
